biotools.summary: Convex-PL^R augments Convex-PL with conformational flexibility for better performance in affinity prediction and virtual screening tasks. It is trained on a more novel dataset that includes cofactors.

bioschemas.name: Convex-PL-R
bioschemas.summary: Convex-PL^R augments Convex-PL with conformational flexibility for better performance in affinity prediction and virtual screening tasks. It is trained on a more novel dataset that includes cofactors.
